comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Many Mothers in Germany lost their son's or daughters fighting for Hitler.  And many of the German soldiers shot Innocent Jewish People ,young and old.    They also tortured and killed many from the Soviet Union.    A German Mother should hang her head in shame.

comment.author: 8139976@N03
comment._content: The "Mutterkreuz" was commonly also called "rabbit medal" (Kaninchenorden). It was supposed to be given to women who had given birth to at least four children. More info (albeit in German): (www.annefrankguide.net/en-US/bronnenbank.asp?aid=27226) (www.dhm.de/lemo/html/nazi/innenpolitik/mutterkreuz/)
